A bear who loves honey so much he gets kicked out of the forest for stealing too much from the beehives.
A bear who becomes the unlikely leader of a group of honey-loving animals in a quest to find the legendary "Land of Honey".
A bear who discovers a magical honey tree that never runs out of honey, but only grants it to those who can solve its riddles.
A bear who becomes obsessed with collecting different types of honey from around the world, but must face the consequences of his actions when he inadvertently starts a global honey shortage.
A bear who is tasked with protecting a hive of endangered bees from poachers, but must navigate the complex web of animal politics in order to succeed.
